pages.text: $(li)Scented Candles are an improve version of the $(l:patchouli:decoration/buzzier_bees/candle)Candles$(/l) because produces a potion effect of nearby creatures, including you.$(br)$(li)This potion effect depends of the placed Scented Candle.
pages.title: Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Allium Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Fire Resistance effect.$(br)$(li)This effect gives you inmunity of any kind of Fire Damage.
$(li)Lily of the Valley Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Poison effect.$(br)$(li)This effect damage you every second until you have half hearth of life.
pages.title: Valley Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Azure Bluet Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Blindness effect.$(br)$(li)This effect impairs your vision as if a thick black fog were surrounding you, reducing your field of vision.
pages.title: A. Bluet Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Cornflower Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Jump Boost effect.$(br)$(li)This effect allows you to jump greater heights.
pages.title: C. Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Oxeye Daisy Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Regeneration effect.$(br)$(li)This effect regenerares your life health.
pages.title: O. Daisy Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Tulip Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Weakness effect.$(br)$(li)This effect reduces the damage that you inflict to other creatures.
pages.title: Tulip Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Wither Rose Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Wither effect.$(br)$(li)This effect inflicts damage every second.
pages.title: W. Rose Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Clover Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Bad Luck effect.$(br)$(li)This effect reduces your probability of generate good drops in the new naturally Chests generated while this effect is still active.
pages.title: Clover Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Buttercup Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Sunny effect.$(br)$(li)If this effect is applied to creatures that are damaged with the Sunlight, like Zombies or Skeletos, they will start to burn.
pages.title: B. Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Cartwheel Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Levitation effect.$(br)$(li)This effect makes you float rising slowly to the sky.
pages.title: C. Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Violet Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Invisibility effect.$(br)$(li)This effect makes you harder to detect from nearby hostile creatures.
$(li)Dianthus Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Strength effect.$(br)$(li)This effect allows you to inflict more damage to other creatures.
pages.title: D. Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Lotus Flower Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Slow Falling effect.$(br)$(li)This effect makes you slow falling from heighs, allowing to you to fall from big heights without reveicing any damage.
pages.title: L. F. Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Hibiscus Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Glowing effect.$(br)$(li)Creatures with this effect will be easier to detect in the darkness or between blocks.
pages.title: H. Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Monkey Brush Candle gives the nearby creatures Relief effect.$(br)$(li)This effect will heal you if the incoming damage is greater than or equal to the level.
pages.title: M. B. Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Water Hyacinth Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Worsening effect.$(br)$(li)This effect will increase the incoming damage to you if the incoming damage is greater than or equal to the level.
pages.title: W. H. Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Gilia Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Speed effect.$(br)$(li)This effect will increase your movement speed.
pages.title: Gilia Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Yucca Flower Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Persistance effect.$(br)$(li)This effect will increase you movement speed in 5%.
pages.title: Y. F. Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)White Searocket Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Watet Breathing effect.$(br)$(li)This effect will allow you to be more time underwater without breathing.
pages.title: S. Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Autumn Crocus Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Foul Taste effect.$(br)$(li)This effect gives a small boost of hunger to the foods you eat.
pages.title: A. C. Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Bluebell Scented Candle gives the nearby creatures Hunger effect.$(br)$(li)This effect makes you spent your hunger bar quickly.
pages.title: Bluebell Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Poppy Scented Candle gives nearby creatures Night Vision effect.$(br)$(li)This effect allows you to see better in the darkness.
pages.title: Poppy Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Dandelion Scented Candle doesn't give any effect to nearby creatures.
pages.title: D. Scented Candle

pages.text: $(li)Blue Orchid Scented Candle doesn't give any effect to nearby creatures.
pages.title: B. O. Scented Candle
